full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================

* **Title (English/French)**: W6898-240687 - Inspection and Maintenance of Mechanical System - Department of National Defence, New Brunswick
* **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: WS4640885356 / Numéro de sollicitation : WS4640885356
* **Contracting Entity (English/French)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity (English/French)**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Dylon Leonard (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [dylon.leonard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dylon.leonard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not available
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20078581?extsite=MjAwNzg1ODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Tender Details**:
	+ **Tender Type**: Competitive – Open Bidding
	+ **Service Category**: Building Maintenance Service
	+ **Region of Opportunity**: New Brunswick
	+ **Contract Start Date**: July 17, 2024
	+ **Contract End Date**: None
	+ **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Brief Overview**
---------------

Canada is seeking offers from prepared Respondents to provide the furnish of all required materials, tools, and equipment, together with the labour to complete repairs, maintenance and inspections of the mechanical systems at the Naval Reserve HMCS Brunswicker in accordance with the specification.

**Submission Details**
--------------------

All inquiries of a technical or contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority Dylon Leonard. 

* Last modification date: July 10, 2024
* Tender closing date: July 17th, 2024 at 14:00:00
* URL : `https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20078581?extsite=M
